features: Volumizing And Lengthening Mascara: Full lash fringe that’s feathery soft, with no flaking, no smudging, and no clumping; Just voluptuous volume and intense length. 20x more volume and up to 2x more length. Based on a consumer claims study, November 2020
L'Oreal Paris Mascara: Get the long, full eyelashes you love with our best mascaras and primers; Choose from our innovative volumizing formulas and variety of brushes

Create you perfect eye makeup look with our collection of Voluminous mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge proof eyeliner, define your brows and discover eye shadow palettes with shades made for every eye color

Because You're Worth It: L'Oreal Paris Makeup helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, brow pencils, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks and much more

Perfect To Pair With: L'Oreal Paris Infallible Never Fail Mechanical Pencil Eyeliner; With long-lasting, fade-proof color, Infallible Never Fail Eyeliner ensures your look stays put for up to 16 hours
body.description: Take your lashes to paradise. Our 1st mascara for voluptuous volume and length. Soft wavy bristle brush holds maximum formula for a dramatic volumizing charge. 200plus bristles catch every lash for a full fringe effect. Smooth glide formula provides silky volume in 1 coat. Lashes are feathery soft to the touch. Women agreed: 91% saw in10se and volumized lashes and 87% saw more beautiful lashes. plus98% lengthening effect. Voluptuous Volume and Length Full Lash Fringe, Feathery Soft Soft Wavy Bristle Brush Smooth Glide Formula Place brush at base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes easily with soap and water. To safeguard L’Oreal Purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injuRed, irritated, or infected. Consult a physician promptly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a hard time finding the right mascara and this one is the best so far. It compares to the more expensive mascaras that cost $30 or more for less than half the price. I am enrolled in the mascara subscription through Amazon that sends you a different mascara every 2 months for $ 11.00. I like it so far. I am trying out mascaras I would have never tried. I got stuck on buying the too faced mascara that cost $ 30 and is about the same as L’Oréal lash paradise. Having bought the same mascara for many years and wasting so much money because it is way overpriced I am Pleased at the savings of this subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new mascara
reviews.reviewText: I compared this to a more expensive brand and found them to be the same except this mascara came off easier when washing my face than the other which doesn’t damage my lashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No Eye or Skin Irritation
reviews.reviewText: As a woman with skin sensitivities I needed a change from Maybelline and Cover Girl mascaras that caused itching and skin irritation. Lash Paradise washable mascara appears to have solved the problem - no adverse effects! My only complaint is that the product clumps at the tip of the brush. Manageable trade off for no eye irritation. Stays on till I wash it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best drugstore mascara
reviews.reviewText: This is the best mascara I have used. I only wish that the tube would last a little longer before it starts gumming up and needs to be replaced. It’s the best for length and volume though. Minimal smudging or flaking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comparable to the “Better Than Sex” mascara by Too Faced
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried out this mascara and let me tell you, it's a serious game-changer! If you're a fan of the "Better Than Sex" mascara by Too Faced, you're going to absolutely love this one.First of all, the volume and length it gives to my lashes are on point! It really makes my eyes pop and gives them that extra oomph. The formula is smooth and doesn't clump, which is a huge plus. Plus, the brush is designed in such a way that it coats every lash evenly, giving them that perfect fluttery look.I also noticed that this mascara has great staying power. It doesn't smudge or flake throughout the day, which is a must-have for me. I can confidently wear it all day without worrying about any panda eyes.Overall, I highly recommend this mascara as a fantastic alternative to the "Better Than Sex" mascara. It delivers amazing volume, length, and staying power, giving you incredible lashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best mascara
reviews.reviewText: I usually get the Sky High mascara but was looking around for something that would be a little more plump. I got these to try out and honestly, it is not great. I find the mascara to be super flaky and end up getting eye irritations from it, and my top lashes stick to my bottom lashes SO much more. Suffice to say I'll be going back to my tried and true mascara. I'll keep these as a backup but I don't recommend this one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love LOVE this!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mascara! It really adds length and volume to my eyelashes. It doesn’t clump together and holds well all day. This is my new fav mascara

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this several times and was satisfied, but now I am surprised that this time a fake product was sent to me!!!! My eyelashes stick together and the product is completely poor quality.

This mascara truly is the best mascara I’ve ever used! Wow!Pro tip, curl your lashes then apply a coat of mascara let it dry a bit for about 3 minutes then with your fingers push your lashes up to your eyelid for 10 seconds then apply your final coat of mascara
Me gusta el producto, es resistente al agua, tiene larga duración, alarga las pestañas y las hace parecer abundantes ✨.

The media could not be loaded. I have super sensitive eyes that water whenever I wear mascara. Not with this mascara! No itchiness, redness or watering! This mascara fans out my lashes in a feathery way which is exactly how I like it! I hate clumpy mascara. This is not that! The black brown is perfect. I’m a very fair redhead and black is too harsh but sometimes black brown mascaras are TOO light coloured that my eyes don’t stand out. This is the perfect black brown. Dark but not as a dark are black! And it lasts all day! I was using another clean green brand before and thought I loved it until I noticed it was flake off shortly after application and my long blonde lashes would look so short from it disappearing from the ends. Not with this mascara. All day it stays on my lashes ! And it’s easy to apply, goes on fabulously! To remove it in the evening I just rinse my face with warm water first to get the mascara off my lashes and then go in with a damp microfibre makeup cleansing pad to further remove any residue. All you need is a water and a microfibre cloth or pad, no makeup remover needed! Will be buying this from now on :)!!!
